channel.title: Frequent Server Crashes; What's causing them?
channel.description:
I just started a new server and so far it's going GREAT. I've got over 300 Accounts made on it already in the first 2 days of being online.
However, I've recently been crashing TONS!
What's caushing it?
Is it...
[b]My Internet Connection?[/b] I'm running High-Speed Internet and never have any problems with it.
[b]My shitty computer?[/b] Is it my 0.9Ghz, 512MB RAM, 30Gb Hard Drive 10 year old computer?
[b]Is it my coding?[/b] Is it possible any of this is all due to a coding error? It will usually crash every hour =\
[b]Is it the amount of players?[/b] I'm getting TONS and TONS of players now, 30+ on at a time and my shitty PC wont even let ME log in. So is it this the problem?
[b]Crashes happen all the time. Don't worry about it[/b] Am I not to worry about these crashes? They happened all the time and I'm just going crazy? Not to worry because every server WILL have crashes such as mine?
Thanks in advance. Rep+ For whoever helps ;)

item.title: Frequent Server Crashes; What's causing them?
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

Your clientListener closes everytime after a few players. nothing with your comp. This gay ass laptop has 768MB ram
and like 66GB Hard drive. and i have same cause my clientListener closes everytime lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Frequent Server Crashes; What's causing them?
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

Impossible; when the handler is set at ‘20’ players max, then if theres ‘x’ ammount of players on the server… in this case ‘20’ then he wouldn’t be able to connect… no one would, thus having nothing to do with crashing.

Read full topic

item.title: Frequent Server Crashes; What's causing them?
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“Blue Summer, post:1, topic:5351”]I just started a new server and so far it’s going GREAT. I’ve got over 300 Accounts made on it already in the first 2 days of being online.

However, I’ve recently been crashing TONS!

What’s caushing it?

Is it…

My Internet Connection?
I’m running High-Speed Internet and never have any problems with it.

My shitty computer?
Is it my 0.9Ghz, 512MB RAM, 30Gb Hard Drive 10 year old computer?

Is it my coding?
Is it possible any of this is all due to a coding error? It will usually crash every hour =\

Is it the amount of players?
I’m getting TONS and TONS of players now, 30+ on at a time and my shitty PC wont even let ME log in. So is it this the problem?

Crashes happen all the time. Don’t worry about it
Am I not to worry about these crashes? They happened all the time and I’m just going crazy? Not to worry because every server WILL have crashes such as mine?

Thanks in advance. Rep+ For whoever helps ;)[/quote]
Computer. End of story. Full stop. No more posts.
Oh and ps.

7.We don’t talk about rep, giving or asking for it.

Read full topic
